title: What if our health care system kept us healthy?
description: Rebecca Onie asks audacious questions: What if waiting rooms were a place to improve daily health care? What if doctors could prescribe food, housing and heat in the winter? At TEDMED she describes Health Leads, an organization that does just that -- and does it by building a volunteer base as elite and dedicated as a college sports team.
author: Rebecca Onie
keywords: TED, talks, global issues, health, health care, medicine, poverty, public health, social change, society
